generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@notice Allows a depositor to stake his tokens 
@param amount deposit amount

@notice Allows a depositor to unstake tokens
@param amount deposit to be withdrawn

calculateAPY(uint256,uint256).notice: Approximates APY based on the assumption of 15 seconds per block

calculateReward(address).notice: internal fucntion to calculate rewards based on compound interest.  Applies the interest rate to the staked amount for each reward block,  adding the interest to the total rewards and increasing the staked amount accordingly.

depositTokens(uint256).notice: Allows a depositor to stake his tokens

unstakeTokens(uint256).notice: Allows a depositor to unstake tokens
